entries.name: Effect: Adaptive Strike
entries.description: The creature's melee strikes count either as adamantine, cold iron or silver.

entries.name: Effect: Alchemical Strike
entries.description:
Choose acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage. The drudge imbues its fist attacks with this damage.

Each hit deals 1d6 points of damage of the same type as that of the bomb loaded into it. Each bomb has enough fluid in it for 10 successful strikes.

entries.name: Effect: Ancestral Journey
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws and all skill checks.

entries.name: Effect: Ancestral Response
entries.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus on saving throws.

entries.name: Effect: Artificer's Command
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws.

entries.name: Effect: Aura of Command
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to Will saves.

entries.name: Effect: Aura of Corruption
entries.description: The creature is treated as if it was a plant for the purposes of any effect that particularly harms or inconveniences plant creatures more than other creatures, but does not gain any benefits of being a plant creature.

entries.name: Effect: Aura of Misfortune
entries.description: Living creatures must roll twice on all d20 rolls and use the lower result.

entries.name: Effect: Battle Cry
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Blasphemous Utterances
entries.description:
The creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to saves against mental effects.

It can't take actions that have the concentrate trait unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:flat|dc:10] check. Failing this check wastes the action.

entries.name: Effect: Blood Frenzy
entries.description: The creature gains temporary hit points and other effects based on the specific creature.

entries.name: Effect: Blood Fury
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Blood Magic
entries.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws.

entries.name: Effect: Blood Siphon (Critical Failure)
entries.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to AC and saves.

entries.name: Effect: Blood Soak
entries.description: The creature gains a +4 status bonus to damage rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Bloodline Magic
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to Deception checks.

entries.name: Effect: Bodyguard's Defense
entries.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

entries.name: Effect: Bosun's Command - Attack Bonus
entries.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Bosun's Command - Speed Bonus
entries.description: The creature gains a +10 status bonus its Speeds.

entries.name: Effect: Brand of the Impenitent
entries.description: The creature takes a -1 status penalty to AC and saves, reduces its resistances by 2, and gains weakness 2 to good damage.

entries.name: Effect: Breach the Abyss - Acid
entries.description: The creature deals an extra [[/r {2d6}[acid]]]{2d6 acid damage} with its weapon.

entries.name: Effect: Breach the Abyss - Cold
entries.description: The creature deals an extra [[/r {2d6}[cold]]]{2d6 cold damage} with its weapon.

entries.name: Effect: Breach the Abyss - Electricity
entries.description: The creature deals an extra [[/r {2d6}[electricity]]]{2d6 electricity damage} with its weapon.

entries.name: Effect: Breach the Abyss - Fire
entries.description: The creature deals an extra [[/r {2d6}[fire]]]{2d6 fire damage} with its weapon.

entries.name: Effect: Breach the Abyss - Negative
entries.description: The creature deals an extra [[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6 negative damage} with its weapon.

entries.name: Effect: Brutal Rally
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Call to Action
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Call to Blood
entries.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls against @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} creatures.

entries.name: Effect: Call to Halt (Success)
entries.description: The target takes a -10-foot penalty to all its Speeds for 1 minute.

entries.name: Effect: Calming Bioluminescence
entries.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against emotion effects.

entries.name: Effect: Caustic Mucus
entries.description: The creature takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speed. This Speed reduction ends with the persistent acid damage.

entries.name: Effect: Choose Weakness
entries.description:
The Ghaele changes the elemental damage damage dealt by its greatsword and light ray to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic.

It can also change its energy resistance to any of these energy types (this can be a different type than for its attacks).

entries.name: Effect: Cite Precedent
entries.description: The creature gains a -2 circumstance penalty on the next Diplomacy check in a legal argument.

entries.name: Effect: Commander's Aura
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, AC, saves, and skill checks.

entries.name: Effect: Crocodile Form
entries.description: The bunyip gains a land Speed of 20 feet, but it's Jaws Strike looses the persistent bleed damage.

entries.name: Effect: Crush of Hundreds
entries.description: The creature takes a -10-foot penalty to all Speeds.

entries.name: Effect: Crushing Spirits
entries.description: The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to all its Speeds.

entries.name: Effect: Crystalline Dust Form
entries.description: The creature gains a fly Speed of 40 feet.

entries.name: Effect: Curse of Boiling Blood
entries.description: The creature gains weakness to fire 20.

entries.name: Effect: Curse of Fire
entries.description: The creature gains weakness to fire 15.

entries.name: Effect: Curse of Frost
entries.description: The creature gains weakness to cold 15.

entries.id: Effect: Curse of the Baneful Venom
entries.name: Effect: Curse of the Baneful Venom
entries.description: The creature immediately attempts its next saving throw against a poison with a -2 status penalty.

entries.name: Effect: Defensive Assault
entries.description: The creature gains a circumstance bonus to AC based on the weapons used for defense.

entries.name: Effect: Devour Soul
entries.description: The creature gains 10 temporary Hit Points and a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

entries.id: Effect: Devour Soul (Victim Level 15 or Higher)
entries.name: Effect: Devour Soul (Victim Level 15 or Higher)
entries.description: The creature gains 10 temporary Hit Points and a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Dire Warning
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Dirty Bomb
entries.description: The creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to fortitude saves against the chemist's Crude Bombs.

entries.name: Effect: Dirty Bomb (Critical Failure)
entries.description: The creature takes a -3 circumstance penalty to fortitude saves against the chemist's Crude Bombs.

entries.name: Effect: Distracting Frolic
entries.description: The target ally can roll the save twice and take the better result.

entries.name: Effect: Disturbing Vision
entries.description: The visions last [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}, and while they do, all evil creatures in the area gain a +1 status bonus to all checks.

entries.name: Effect: Ensnare
entries.description: The creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speed.

entries.name: Effect: Entangling Slime
entries.description: The creature takes a -5-foot penalty to Speed.

entries.name: Effect: Fanatical Frenzy
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls, and takes a -2 status penalty to AC.

entries.name: Effect: Feed
entries.description: The creature gains a status bonus to its checks and DCs depending on how often it used the Feed ability.

entries.name: Effect: Fiddle
entries.description: The creature take a –10-foot status penalty to Speeds.

entries.name: Effect: Filth Wave
entries.description: The creature takes a -10-foot penalty to its Speeds.

entries.name: Effect: Focused Assault
entries.description: The creature deals additional damage based on the amount of longswords it wields.

entries.name: Effect: Fortune's Favor
entries.description: Whenever the creature attempts a specific type of saving throw, it rolls twice and takes the higher result. The type of saving throw is determined by the suit that featured most prominently in the harrow reading: Fortitude (Hammers or Shields), Reflex (Keys or Books), or Will (Stars or Crowns)

entries.name: Effect: Ghonhatine Feed
entries.description: The creature gains @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{Fast Healing 5} and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Glowing Spores
entries.description: The creature takes a -4 penalty to Stealth checks.

entries.name: Effect: Goblin Song
entries.description: The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.

entries.name: Effect: Graveknight's Curse
entries.description: The creature's Speed is reduced by 10.

entries.name: Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Critical Failure)
entries.description: The creature takes a -4 status penalty to Perception checks and saves against mental effects.

entries.name: Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Failure)
entries.description: The creature takes a -2 status penalty to Perception checks and saves against mental effects.

entries.name: Effect: Harmonizing Aura (Allies)
entries.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to sonic damage rolls and a +1 status bonus to AC and all saves against sonic and auditory effects

entries.name: Effect: Harmonizing Aura (Enemies)
entries.description: The creature gains a -2 status bonus to sonic damage rolls and a -1 status bonus to AC and all saves against sonic and auditory effects

entries.name: Effect: Harrowing Misfortune
entries.description: The creature must roll twice and take the lower result on its next roll of a specific type, determined by the card's suit. The suits and their effects are: Hammers (melee attack roll), Keys (Reflex save), Shields (Fortitude save), Books (skill check), Stars (Will save), and Crowns (spell attack roll).

entries.name: Effect: Haywire
entries.description: The creature takes a -1 circumstance penalty to Strikes but deals an additional [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning damage} plus @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{Knockdown}.

entries.name: Effect: Hunted Fear
entries.description: The creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Survival checks to avoid getting lost.

entries.name: Effect: Hydra Heads
entries.description: The number of heads the hydra currently has.

entries.name: Effect: Hypnotic Stare
entries.description: That target takes a -2 penalty to Will saving throws.

entries.name: Effect: Infectious Aura
entries.description:
The creature takes a -2 status penalty to saves against disease effects.

If a creature within range contracts or progresses a disease, all adjacent creatures are exposed to the same disease, at the same DC.

entries.name: Effect: Inspirational Presence
entries.description: Any of the teacher's students in the aura gains a +1 circumstance bonus to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}.

entries.name: Effect: Inspired Feast
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Inspiring Presence
entries.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against fear effects.

entries.name: Effect: Instinctual Tinker (Critical Success)
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Invigorating Passion
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and 10 temporary Hit Points.

entries.name: Effect: Lantern of Hope
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls and to saving throws against @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{Crushing Despair}.

entries.name: Effect: Lantern of Hope (Gestalt)
entries.description: The creature gains a +3 status bonus to damage rolls and to saving throws against @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{Crushing Despair}.

entries.name: Effect: Lost Red Cap
entries.description: The creature takes a –4 status penalty to its damage rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Lurker's Glow (Critical Failure)
entries.description: The creature sheds bright light in a 20-foot emanation for the duration of the effect.

entries.name: Effect: Mangling Rend
entries.description: The target takes a -20-foot status penalty to all Speeds until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Effect: Manipulate Luck (Bad)
entries.description: The creature must roll twice and use the lower result on its next d20 roll.

entries.name: Effect: Manipulate Luck (Good)
entries.description: The affected creature can roll twice on one d20 roll within the next minute and use the higher result.

entries.name: Effect: Moon Frenzy
entries.description: The creature becomes one size larger, increases its reach by 5 feet, and increases the damage of its jaws Strike (or a similar Strike) by 2.

entries.name: Effect: Mortal Reflection
entries.description: The imperfect automaton draws upon the target's emotions to recall a semblance of mortal feeling, gaining a +5-foot status bonus to its Speed for 1 minute.

entries.name: Effect: Necrotic Field
entries.description: Undead within the aura deal an additional [[/r {1d6}[negative]]]{1d6 negative damage} with their natural attacks.

entries.name: Effect: No Quarter!
entries.description: The captain orders their shipmates to fight without mercy. All allied creatures of equal or lower level within 20 feet of the ship captain gain a+1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the ship captain's next turn.

entries.name: Effect: Nymph Queen's Inspiration
entries.description:
The creature gains a +1 status bonus to all Crafting checks, Performance checks, and Will saves.

Bards receive additional benefits:

  • Enigma Muse: +1 status bonus to all Lore checks (not included)
  • Maestro Muse: +2 status bonus to Performance checks for the purpose of determining the effects of compositions
  • Polymath Muse: +4 status bonus to untrained skill checks
  • Other Muses: +2 status bonus to Will saves against fey

entries.name: Effect: Pain Frenzy
entries.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Parry Dance
entries.description: The rake gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of their next turn.

entries.name: Effect: Profane Gift
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, and saving throws.

entries.name: Effect: Protean Anatomy
entries.description: The creature gains resistance to either acid, electricity, or sonic according to its Protean Anatomy.

entries.name: Effect: Putrid Blast
entries.description: Creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Fortitude saves against xulgath bile for 1 minute.

entries.name: Effect: Read the Stars (Critical Success)
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws.

entries.name: Effect: Revert Form
entries.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.

entries.name: Effect: Rockfall Critical Failure
entries.description: The affected creature takes a -20-foot circumstance penalty to its movement speeds for 2 rounds.

entries.name: Effect: Rockfall Failure
entries.description: The affected creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its movement speeds for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Rope Snare
entries.description: The creature takes a 10-foot circumstance penalty to Speed.

entries.name: Effect: Rune of Destruction (Greatsword)
entries.description: The greatsword gains the deadly trait with 3d12, and a creature hit with the greatsword is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Rune of Destruction|traits:arcane] save.

entries.name: Effect: Rune of Destruction (Longspear)
entries.description: The longspear gains the deadly trait with 3d8, and a creature hit with the longspear is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Rune of Destruction|traits:arcane] save.

entries.name: Effect: Rune of Destruction (Rock)
entries.description: The rock gains the deadly trait with 3d12, and a creature hit with the rock is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Rune of Destruction|traits:arcane] save.

entries.name: Effect: Rune of Flames (Greatsword)
entries.description: The greatsword deals an additional 3d6 fire damage on all attacks.

entries.name: Effect: Rune of Flames (Longspear)
entries.description: The longspear deals an additional 3d6 fire damage on all attacks.

entries.name: Effect: Rune of Flames (Rock)
entries.description: The rock deals an additional 3d6 fire damage on all attacks.

entries.name: Effect: Rune of Smiting (Greatsword)
entries.description: When the greatsword hits, the giant can Push the target back 10 feet, or 20 feet on a critical hit.

entries.name: Effect: Rune of Smiting (Longspear)
entries.description: When the longspear hits, the giant can Push the target back 10 feet, or 20 feet on a critical hit.

entries.name: Effect: Rune of Smiting (Rock)
entries.description: When the rock hits, the giant can Push the target back 10 feet, or 20 feet on a critical hit.

entries.name: Effect: Shadow Rapier
entries.description: The rake shrouds their sword in negative energy, changing the damage type to negative.

entries.name: Effect: Sinful Bite
entries.description: The creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

entries.name: Effect: Snake Form
entries.description: The bunyip's tail Strike gains reach 10 and @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{Grab}, but it's Jaws Strike looses the persistent bleed damage.

entries.name: Effect: Soul Siphon
entries.description: The creature gains 5 temporary Hit Points and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Splintered Ground
entries.description: The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds.

entries.name: Effect: Splintered Ground (Critical Failure)
entries.description: The creature takes a -15-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds.

entries.name: Effect: Spray Toxic Oil
entries.description: The creature gains weakness to fire 5, and whenever the creature critically fails wth an attack roll with a wielded weapon, it drops the weapon.

entries.name: Effect: Stench
entries.description: The creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to saves against disease.

entries.id: Effect: Stick a Fork in It
entries.name: Effect: Stick a Fork in It
entries.description: The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds.

entries.name: Effect: Sticky Spores
entries.description: The creature takes a –10-foot status penalty to all its Speeds.

entries.name: Effect: Sting of the Lash
entries.description: The creature gains 5 temporary Hit Points.

entries.id: Effect: Stoke the Fervent - High Tormentor
entries.name: Effect: Stoke the Fervent - High Tormentor
entries.description:
Each ally that hears the call gains a +4 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls, a +2 status bonus to saving throws, and takes a -2 status penalty to AC. Affected allies must use at least one of their actions to Strike each round, if they are able even if it means attacking an ally, object, or thin air).

The effect duration has been set to the average duration for [[/br 2d4 #rounds]]{2d4 rounds}. Set the duration to the correct value when the effect is added.

entries.name: Effect: Swell
entries.description: The creature grows to Huge size, and its reach increases to 15 feet. It also gains 12 temporary Hit Points, resistance 5 to bludgeoning, and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls

entries.name: Effect: Sylvan Wine
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 item bonus to Will saves and a +3 item bonus to Will saves against fear effects.

entries.name: Effect: Tail Lash (Attack Roll)
entries.description: The creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to the triggering attack roll.

entries.name: Effect: Tail Lash (Skill Check)
entries.description: The creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to the triggering skill check.

entries.name: Effect: Take Them Down!
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Technology Control
entries.description:
The target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to its attack rolls and DCs against a creature it would not normally attack.

Note: This effect applies a penalty to all rolls and DCs while active.

entries.name: Effect: Timely Advice
entries.description: The sage gives the ally a savvy piece of advice, providing valuable insight. The ally gains a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

entries.name: Effect: Totems of the Past
entries.description: Any lizardfolk allies in the area are inspired, gaining a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Transfer Protection
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to AC and saves against evil creatures.

entries.name: Effect: Uncanny Tinker
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Undead Mastery
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, AC, saves, and skill checks.

entries.name: Effect: Unluck Aura
entries.description: The creature must roll twice and take the worse result on all checks.

entries.name: Effect: Void Shroud
entries.description: Living creatures in the emanation take a -2 status penalty to saves against fear and death effects.

entries.name: Effect: Volcanic Purge
entries.description: The target takes [[/r {4d6}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}, and as long as it has this persistent fire damage, it also takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

entries.name: Effect: War Leader
entries.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks.

entries.name: Effect: Waterlogged
entries.description: While waterlogged, the berberoka can use Spray Water, their size grows to Gargantuan, and their Speed is reduced to 15 feet.

entries.name: Effect: Whirlwind Form
entries.description: The creature gains resistance 10 to physical damage.

entries.name: Effect: Witchflame (Critical Failure)
entries.description: The creature gains weakness 10 to fire.

entries.name: Effect: Witchflame (Failure)
entries.description: The creature gains weakness 5 to fire.

entries.name: Effect: Witchflame (Success)
entries.description: The creature gains weakness 5 to fire.

entries.name: Effect: Wolf Shape
entries.description: The barghest gains Speed 40 and its jaws gain @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{Knockdown}.

entries.name: Effect: Wrath of Fate
entries.description: An affected creature can choose to roll twice when it attempts an attack, saving throw, or skill check and take the lower result. After this the effect ends.

entries.name: Effect: Xulgath Stench
entries.description: The creature takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds.
